General.Name: Hank Payments Corp
General.Description: Hank Payments Corp. operates as a software-as-a-service (SaaS) based consumer fintech company in the United States. The company's bank-enabled technology platform acts as a consumers' personal financial concierge to automate personal cash flow management. Its platform also serves businesses, affiliates, and wholesalers. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 66 Wellington St. West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5K 1B7
